title: Chicken Satay Skewers
directions: Cut the chicken breast into slices. One breast should make about 4 slices. Place chicken in a dish.
In a bowl, combine all other ingredients and stir together. Pour over meat.
Cover meat and put in the fridge to marinate overnight or at least up to 2 hours.
When ready to cook, weave a skewer in and out of the chicken slice.
If grilling, baste the chicken with olive oil or spray with Pam spray. Put on direct medium heat and turn over after four minutes. It will cook in about 8-10 minutes.
If cooking in the oven, do not baste or spray. Just move to a baking sheet and broil on low. Flip after 4 minutes and check inside to see when it is done.
